item.title: Why Your AI Agents Need an Identity Layer: Lessons from OWASP Top 10 for Agentic Applications
item.content:encoded: Discover why an identity layer is the best way to stop goal hijacking and tool misuse while keeping your system safe if an agent fails.

item.title: The Revenue Potential of Shared Accounts With Fine-Grained Authorization (FGA)
item.content:encoded: Explore three B2C use cases where Fine-Grained Authorization (FGA) turns security checkboxes into revenue levers for streaming, gaming, and e-commerce.

item.title: How Advanced Customizations for Universal Login (ACUL) Helps You Build Seamless Auth Experiences
item.content:encoded: ACUL gives engineering teams the freedom to build branding-aligned, logic-driven authentication flows using their own design systems.

item.title: Inside OpenFGA's Improved ListObjects Algorithm: A Streaming Pipeline Traversal
item.content:encoded: Learn how OpenFGA turns an authorization model into a concurrent, backpressure-aware pipeline that streams results as it traverses relationship graphs.

item.title: Federated Identity vs. Single Sign-On: Key Differences
item.content:encoded: A deep dive into the differences between Single Sign-On (SSO) and Federated Identity, covering concepts, protocols, and implementation nuances.

item.title: You Talked, We Listened: How Your Feedback Shaped Our New B2B Plans
item.content:encoded: Discover how Auth0 is improving B2B plan flexibility with new Enterprise Connection options and M2M token add-ons based on developer feedback.

item.title: Auth0 B2B Plans Upgraded: Free Self-Service SSO, SCIM, and More!
item.content:encoded: Ship B2B applications, now with advanced features like Self-Service SSO, SCIM, and more – for free.

item.title: Agents Can Either Be Useful or Secure
item.content:encoded: AI agents force a fundamental choice. That’s a false choice. Identity is the building block to refuse it.

item.title: A Guide to Securing Amazon Bedrock AgentCore with Auth0 for AI Agents
item.content:encoded: Step-by-step guide to integrating Auth0 with AWS Bedrock AgentCore for authentication, authorization, and secure API interactions.

item.title: A Guide to OpenID AuthZEN's Authorization API 1.0
item.content:encoded: Master the OpenID Authorization API 1.0. This guide shows you how to build a decoupled authorization system using Python and FastAPI.
